explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of generative AI and large language models for tasks like classification, summarization, and response generation, which are core applications of machine learning.
explanations.classification: The paper explicitly mentions classification as one of the tasks performed by the generative AI system, achieving 88% accuracy.
explanations.neural network: Large language models (LLMs) are based on neural networks, and the paper discusses their use in understanding and generating natural language text.
explanations.deep learning: The paper focuses on generative AI and large language models, which are advanced applications of deep learning.
explanations.representation learning: Large language models inherently involve representation learning as they learn to represent and generate natural language text.
explanations.Large Language Model: The paper discusses the unexpected power of large language models (LLMs) for understanding and generating natural language text.
explanations.LLM: The abbreviation LLM is used in the abstract to refer to large language models, which are central to the paper's research.
